text: I choose to learn in this formation "information et communication", because i have realised a stage in a Press Agency. Indeed, my father is a journalist, so i'm always know this job. That's why, i'm interrested to the relationship and to the world actualities. During my stage I have realised interwiews and i work in a radio. That's why, i have find many informations for this formation. I think her very interesting and she's match with my futur. I have a big curiosity and i like learn. Indeed, the job of journalist is for my like a dream. Indeed, we can work in the all world, meet people with differents culturs and denonciated. I'm really to integrated Rennes 2! Actually, with the war between Paris and Paris, the job of journalists it's very very important to informe people of the situation. Indeed, this job is difficult and dangereous but it's interresting.The differents specialities of the job attract to me. To come back of this formation, i think i need her to prepared the concours of journalist, after 3 years in the university. I have choose this formation for this diversity: sociologie, english, japan, spanish, history... We can really choose that we watch with own hobbies. That's why, i want to follow my father and become journalist. But, i don't know wo journalist i want to become..Morever,  I'm sure that this formation it's a big opportunity to my projet! That's why, this year i'm very motived to have my licence and i know it's that i want !
